About This Blog 

This space is a location to promote Writer’s Voice literary events on CSU, Chico’s campus, announce Pushcart and Best of the Net nominations for our contributor’s work, and the occasional student blog post, highlighting their research and experience in the Literary Editing and Publishing certificate program.
For thirty-five years, Watershed Review has been the foundation of California State University, Chico’s literary editing and publishing program, providing professional training to countless creative writers and editors.
Read the current issue of Watershed Review (and archives) here: www.watershedreview.com
This blog and Watershed Review, one of the oldest, continuously published, student-edited literary magazines in the nation, are sponsored by the English Department at California State University, Chico.
